mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure the booking widget is more easily accessible and visible on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and consider lazy loading to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve internal linking and use more targeted keywords in meta descriptions and headers.
userExperienceTip: Improve accessibility features like larger fonts for better readability on mobile.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking steps to make the process quicker and more intuitive.
tips: Consider enhancing the site's performance by optimizing large images.
Add more diverse content such as customer reviews or testimonials to increase trust.
Ensure all internal links are working and pointing to relevant content.
